title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a statement that shows the conservation of energy for the large sphere

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For stating or showing the conservation of momentum applied to the collision

m1v1i + m2v2i = m1v1f + m2v2f

1 point is earned: For stating or showing that the spheres are initially traveling in opposite directions

3Mvb + M(-vb) = 3MvL + MvS

2vb = 3vL + vS
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned: For stating or showing the conservation of momentum applied to the collision

m1v1i + m2v2i = m1v1f + m2v2f

1 point is earned: For stating or showing that the spheres are initially traveling in opposite directions

3Mvb + M(-vb) = 3MvL + MvS

2vb = 3vL + vS

The student response earns one of the following points:

m1v1i + m2v2i = m1v1f + m2v2f

2vb = 3vL + vS

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned: For stating or showing the conservation of momentum applied to the collision

m1v1i + m2v2i = m1v1f + m2v2f

1 point is earned: For stating or showing that the spheres are initially traveling in opposite directions

3Mvb + M(-vb) = 3MvL + MvS

2vb = 3vL + vS

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Substituting the given zero value into the answer from part (b)

2vb = 3vL + vS

2vb = 0 + vS

1 point is earned: For a correct answer

vS = 2vb

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For any correct attempt to compare total kinetic energy before the collision to total kinetic energy after the collision

Ki = K3Mi + KMi and Kf = K3Mf + KMf

1 point is earned: For correct substitutions of vb, the expression for vS from part (c), and the correct masses in the kinetic energy terms

K i = 1 2 ( 3M ) ( v b ) 2 + 1 2 ( M ) ( − v b ) 2 =2M v b 2 K f = 1 2 ( M ) ( 2 v b ) 2 =2M v b 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGlb WaaSbaaSqaaiaadMgaaeqaaOGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGa aGOmaaaadaqadaqaaiaaiodacaWGnbaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaeWaae aacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadkgaaeqaaaGccaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWba aSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSYaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGOmaa aadaqadaqaaiaad2eaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaqadaqaaiabgkHiTiaa dAhadaWgaaWcbaGaamOyaaqabaaakiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbe qaaiaaikdaaaGccqGH9aqpcaaIYaGaamytaiaadAhadaqhaaWcbaGa amOyaaqaaiaaikdaaaaakeaacaWGlbWaaSbaaSqaaiaadAgaaeqaaO Gaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGOmaaaadaqadaqaaiaad2ea aiaawIcacaGLPaaadaqadaqaaiaaikdacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadk gaaeqaaaGccaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyyp a0JaaGOmaiaad2eacaWG2bWaa0baaSqaaiaadkgaaeaacaaIYaaaaa aaaa@6360@

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a statement of conservation of energy for ball M as it rises to the new height h
